description.name: Metal pipe clamp with rubber 8" 200-212mm
description.long_desc:
Metal clamp with rubber is designed for securing pipes in water, sewage, heating, gas, and ventilation installations. It provides stability, protects the pipes, and minimizes the impact of vibrations on the entire system.


The clamp is equipped with screws that allow adjustment and secure fastening of the clamp to the appropriate diameter of the pipe.


The clamp is intended for pipes with a diameter of 8", corresponding to a range from 200 mm to 212 mm.


The set includes a double-threaded screw and an expansion plug.
description.short_desc:
Metal clamp with rubber is designed for securing pipes in water, sewage, heating, gas, and ventilation installations. It provides stability, protects the pipes, and minimizes the impact of vibrations on the entire system.


The clamp is equipped with screws that allow adjustment and secure fastening of the clamp to the appropriate diameter of the pipe.


The clamp is intended for pipes with a diameter of 8", corresponding to a range from 200 mm to 212 mm.


The set includes a double-threaded screw and an expansion plug.
description.description:

The clamp is intended for pipes with a diameter of 8", corresponding to a range from 200 mm to 212 mm.


The set includes a double-threaded screw and an expansion plug.

description.name: Analogue timer
description.long_desc:
• The universal timer allows for a reduction in household energy consumption.

  • Thanks to the timer, you can cut down on expenses related to devices that are often left plugged in, while consuming a minimal amount of energy.

  • The timer can serve as a deterrent for potential intruders by turning on lights during hours when you're typically at home.


Technical Specifications:



  • Power Supply Voltage: 230V ~50Hz

  • Maximum Load: 16A (3680W)

  • Programming: 24-hour

  • Setting Accuracy: 15 minutes

  • Grounding: Yes

  • Indicator Light: Yes

  • Plug / Socket Type: Type E
description.short_desc:

description.name: WiFi smart socket 16A
description.long_desc:
The Geko Smart Socket operates using a WiFi network, allowing easy control through the SmartLife mobile application available on Android and iOS from anywhere in the world. Turning the device on and off can be done either through the button on the plug or by sending a command from the phone application.


This socket allows for setting up a schedule for turning on and off - a particularly useful feature for individuals with aquariums or indoor plant cultivation.


The application enables monitoring of energy consumption.


Technical Data:



  • Supply Voltage: 230V ~50Hz

  • Maximum Load: 16A (3680W)

  • WiFi Standard: 2.4Ghz

  • Timer: Yes

  • Energy Consumption Tracking: Yes

  • Plug / Socket Type: Type E
description.short_desc:

description.name: Neodymium magnet 170kg set with rope 20m and gloves
Car holder for glasses
description.long_desc:
Our car clip holder for glasses is a practical solution for anyone who wants to have their glasses within reach during car journeys.


Main Product Features:


Universal Design:
The holder is designed to fit most glasses, regardless of their shape or size.


Car Clip:
With a special clip, the holder can be easily attached to the car's ventilation cover. The glasses are securely and stably fastened, ensuring comfort and safety while driving.


User-Friendly:
Easy to put on and take off, making it convenient and intuitive to use.


Practical Application:


Perfect for using glasses while driving. Ideal for people who frequently travel and want to have their glasses always at hand. Useful for drivers wearing sunglasses.

description.name: Digital Caliper 150mm 0,02mm Hobby type
description.long_desc:
Product Features



  • Internal & external jaws to make outside and inside dimension measurements

  • Large easy to read LCD display

  • Metric / Inch conversion

  • On/Off button

  • Depth measuring blade

  • Locking screw to ensure precision


Technical Data



  • Material: Stainless Steel

  • Surface Finish: Satin

  • Features: Knurled locking screw, clear large LCD display, retainer

  • Range: 150 mm

  • Resolution: 0.02 mm

  • Overall Length: 236 mm

  • Battery: LR44 1,5V 165 mAh

description.name: Velcro clamp band 60cm x 20mm
description.long_desc:
Velcro strap - cable organizer is a universal and reusable accessory that allows you to easily and quickly organize any number of cables. Thanks to it, you can forget about tangling, losing or damaging your wires.

Product Features:

  • The strap is 60 cm long and 20 mm wide, which allows for easy adjustment to different objects and surfaces.
  • The strap is made of high-quality VELCRO material, which is resistant to moisture, temperature and abrasion.
  • The strap is reusable, you can easily peel it off and stick it again, without damaging the surface.

Product Application:

The strap is ideal for home, office, school, workshop and creative applications. You can use it to attach posters, photos, frames, mirrors, shelves, decorations, tools, accessories and many other things.

description.name: Plastic colored key tags 50pcs
description.long_desc:
Key Tags - Pack of 50


This set of 50 key tags is a convenient way to keep your keys organized and easily identifiable. The package includes key tags in 5 different colors, making it simple to categorize and find your keys at a glance. The colors included are:



  • Green

  • Black

  • Red

  • Yellow

  • Blue

description.name: Quick pass-through electrical couple 2x0,2-4mm2
description.long_desc: The electrical pass-through quick connector 2x0.2-4mm2 is a type of electrical connector that allows for pass-through connections of wires with a cross-section ranging from 0.2 to 4 mm. Application: for connecting both solid and stranded wires.

350x3.6mm nylon cables, black colour with UV filter (100pcs)
description.long_desc:
350mm Nylon Cable Ties


Designed for securing bundles of electrical wires, cables, hoses, pipes, and hubcaps on car wheels. A must-have for every DIY enthusiast.


Convenient and easy to install, highly durable.


The ties have increased resistance to UV radiation.


Technical Specifications:



  • Quantity: 100 pieces per pack

  • Width: 3.6mm

  • Length: 350mm

description.name: Bottle Jack 16T
description.long_desc:
A hydraulic column jack is a reliable device for lifting heavy loads up to 16 tons. Its solid construction ensures durability and safety, and its compact dimensions facilitate handling and transport. In addition, the jack is equipped with a screw-out foot with a strong trapezoidal thread, which prevents overloading and ensures smooth operation. The jack will work in any workshop and garage, where it will be an excellent addition to the equipment.

Technical specification:

  • maximum load capacity - 16 tons
  • minimum height - 22.5 cm
  • maximum height - 42.5 cm

Product characteristics:

    • Its solid construction ensures durability and safety
    • Compact dimensions facilitate handling and transport
    • The jack is equipped with a screw-out foot with a strong trapezoidal thread, which prevents overloading and ensures smooth operation
    • Device for lifting heavy loads up to 16 tons.

description.name: Flap Disc 125mm P100
description.long_desc:
125mm Flap Disc (Grit P100)



  • Applications:

  • Coarse grinding of steel

  • Deburring

  • Rust removal

  • Paint removal

  • Lacquer removal

  • Edge grinding (beveling)

  • Woodworking

  • Grinding weld seams


Technical Specifications:



  • Disc Diameter: 125mm

  • Grit: P100

  • Maximum RPM: 12,200 rpm

  • Arbor Hole Diameter: 22.2mm

description.name: Circlip external straight pliers 160mm/6"
description.long_desc:
Straight External Circlip Pliers


Especially recommended for mounting/dismounting external retaining rings inside brake clamps.


Functional slender tips for very small rings.


Firm grip thanks to handles covered with a special material.


Technical Specifications:


Length: 160mm


Material: Chrome-Vanadium Steel


Handles covered with rubber material


Expanding Spring

description.name: Drywall carrying handle 100kg
description.long_desc:
Handle for carrying gypsum boards and OSB boards. Made of high-quality ABS material characterized by high resistance to mechanical damage.


With its help, carrying OSB boards, gypsum plasterboard, and other materials becomes easier than ever before. Forget about tiresome and unwieldy transportation of heavy boards - now you can do it with ease and comfort.


The ergonomic handle with an anti-slip finish ensures a secure grip, and its specially designed shape minimizes the strain on your hands.


Our handle allows you to carry a load weighing up to 100 kg, making it an ideal tool for various construction tasks. Whether you're renovating your home or undertaking professional construction work, this handle is an essential accessory.


Product Characteristics:



  • Solid construction made of durable ABS material guarantees reliability and long lifespan of the handle.

  • The handle is specially designed to facilitate the carrying of OSB boards, building boards, and gypsum plasterboard.

  • Equipped with an ergonomic handle with an anti-slip finish, providing a secure grip and comfort during transportation.

  • The handle can carry a load weighing up to 100 kg.


Technical Specifications:


Maximum load capacity: up to 100 kg


Material: ABS


Intended use: carrying OSB boards, gypsum plasterboard, building boards


Additional information: anti-slip handle

category.name: Others
category.path: Tools for The Workshop and Garage\Others

category_idosell.path: Tools for The Workshop and Garage\Others

description.name: 150mm wheel hub grinder 1/2"
description.long_desc:
The grinder, equipped with a quick cleaning and rust removal abrasive disc, is designed for fast cleaning and rust removal from hubs, wheels, and brake discs with wheel bolt mounting. The body of the abrasive disc is made of impact-resistant and durable plastic.


Product Features:



  • Velcro-mounted for quick replacement of the cleaning disc.

  • Perfect for use on car, delivery, and van hubs with a diameter of up to 150 mm.

  • Optimized design for hubs with an extended inner diameter of 90 mm.

  • 12.5 mm (1/2") square drive socket for convenient mounting on both impact wrenches and cordless screwdrivers.

  • Maximum rotational speed of 1200 RPM.
description.short_desc:
The grinder, equipped with a quick cleaning and rust removal abrasive disc, is designed for fast cleaning and rust removal from hubs, wheels, and brake discs with wheel bolt mounting. The body of the abrasive disc is made of impact-resistant and durable plastic.


Product Features:

  • Perfect for use on car, delivery, and van hubs with a diameter of up to 150 mm.

  • Optimized design for hubs with an extended inner diameter of 90 mm.

  • 12.5 mm (1/2") square drive socket for convenient mounting on both impact wrenches and cordless screwdrivers.

  • Maximum rotational speed of 1200 RPM.

category.name: Wheel Sets

category_idosell.path: Tools for The Workshop and Garage\Wheel Sets

description.name: Fixed castor wheel 100mm 70kg
description.long_desc:
A solid fixed wheel with a diameter of 100 mm is a reliable addition to various types of carts and transport equipment, characterized by excellent parameters and robust construction. Both the core of the wheel (rim) and the casing have been crafted from the highest quality steel, ensuring exceptional durability and resistance to extreme usage conditions. As a result, the wheel will maintain its excellent properties for an extended period, regardless of the loads or intensive usage.


The tire of this wheel has been made from high-quality rubber, resulting in excellent traction on various types of surfaces. Additionally, the flexible rubber minimizes the risk of scratching or damaging the surface on which the wheel moves. Regardless of the surface on which it will be used, this wheel will provide stability and smooth movement, which is a key feature in ensuring comfort and transport efficiency.


Exceptional durability is another advantage of this fixed wheel. Its ability to withstand pressures weighing up to 70 kg makes it an ideal solution for various applications. It can be utilized in transport carts for conveying heavy loads, in movable furniture, as well as a supportive element in various types of structures. The reliability and versatility of this wheel make it suitable for both professional industrial environments and everyday household applications, serving as an indispensable element that facilitates all transportation challenges.


Product Characteristics:



  • Fixed casing with a mounting plate - steel

  • Wheel core (rim) made of steel

  • Tire made of high-quality rubber

  • Good traction

  • Does not scratch the surface



Dane techniczne:

description.name: Fixed castor wheel 200mm 200kg
description.long_desc:
A constant wheel with a diameter of 200 mm is a reliable addition to various types of carts and transport equipment, characterized by excellent parameters and solid construction. Both the core of the wheel (rim) and the casing have been manufactured from the highest quality steel, guaranteeing exceptional durability and resistance to extreme usage conditions. As a result, the wheel will maintain its excellent properties for a long period, regardless of the loads or intensive usage.


The tire of this wheel has been made from high-quality rubber, translating into excellent traction on various types of surfaces. Additionally, the flexible rubber minimizes the risk of scratching or damaging the surface on which the wheel moves. Regardless of the surface on which it will be used, this wheel will provide stability and smooth movement, which is a crucial feature in ensuring comfort and transport efficiency.


Extraordinary durability is another advantage of this fixed wheel. Its ability to withstand pressures weighing up to 200 kg makes it an ideal solution for various applications. It can be used in transport carts for carrying heavy loads, in movable furniture, as well as a supporting element in various types of structures. The reliability and versatility of this wheel make it suitable for both professional industrial environments and everyday household applications, serving as an indispensable element that facilitates all transportation challenges.


Product Characteristics:



  • Fixed casing with a mounting plate - steel

  • Wheel core (rim) made of steel

  • Tire made of high-quality rubber

  • Good traction

  • Does not scratch the surface

description.name: Electric cord on reel 3x1.5mm2 30m
description.long_desc:
A high-quality, durable drum extension cord with a cable length of 30 meters, equipped with four sockets. It consists of three copper wires, each with a cross-section of 1.5mm2, allowing four devices to be connected simultaneously. This solution is particularly useful on construction sites, in workshops, or in production facilities.


A convenient handle and crank make it easy to wind the cable and transport the extension cord.


Technical specifications:


Weight: 5kg


Cable color: black


Number of sockets: 4


Extension cord type: drum


Cable length: 30m


Cable cross-section: 1.5mm2

description.name: Electric cord on reel 3x1.5mm2 40m
description.long_desc:
A high-quality, sturdy extension reel with a 40-meter cable length, equipped with four sockets. It consists of three copper wires with a cross-section of 1.5mm2 each, allowing you to connect four devices simultaneously. This solution is particularly useful on construction sites, in workshops, or in manufacturing facilities.


The convenient handle and crank make it easy to wind the cable and transport the extension reel.


Technical Specifications:



  • Weight: 7kg

  • Wire Color: Black

  • Number of Sockets: 4

  • Extension Type: Reel

  • Cable Length: 40m

  • Wire Cross-Section: 1.5mm2
